name: salvatoshi
cooked: Not much documentation on the link to understand what it is, but it seems about backing up secrets (like seeds and private keys), while the scheme I’m proposing is about backing up public keys and descriptors/wallet policies.
topic_title: A simple backup scheme for wallet accounts
topic_html_title: A simple backup scheme for wallet accounts
raw: Not much documentation on the link to understand what it is, but it seems about backing up *secrets* (like seeds and private keys), while the scheme I'm proposing is about backing up public keys and descriptors/wallet policies.
